verses.roman:
tathāpi kahiye āmi eka upāya
ei upāya kara' prabhu dekhibe yāhāya

synonyms: tathāpi—still; kahiye—say; āmi—I; eka upāya—one means; ei upāya—this means; kara'—try to adopt; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhibe—will see you; yāhāya—by that.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya then suggested, "There is one means by which you can directly see Him.
